forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 23 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a canvas of mostly sunny skies, the city breathing in a refreshingly mild breeze. As the sun finds its place, the day’s warmth nudges the temperature closer to 64, before settling gently around 62. The west-southwest wind sweeps down from the hills, adding a vigorous touch with gusts reaching up to 28 mph, enough to dance through the trees and tease at loose papers. Whether you’re meandering through bustling streets or sipping a coffee outside, the clarity of the day invites one to revel in its bright embrace.

As evening approaches, the sky holds on to its clarity, promising a mostly clear night ahead with temperatures dipping to a comfortable 53. The ongoing wind, although slightly softer, continues to carry an energizing spirit. For those planning their attire, layering remains a wise choice; a light jacket will serve well against the lingering coolness that can sneak up in these parts. The lush green spaces invite a leisurely stroll or perhaps a quiet moment with a book, while the lively cafés teem with chatter and warmth. An evening of discovery awaits, whether through the taste of a new pastry or the company of friends, as the city whispers stories in the golden glow of the setting sun.
